item.title: Cite as you Write
item.description: Good news for TeXnicians and those down with Mark (aka Markdown, RST, whatnot): this is the time to go pester the author of your favorite editor for Zotero integration! Editor integration vim Graciously supplied by David Lukes: paste it in your .vimrc (and modify to your liking): function! ZoteroCite() " pick a format based on the filetype (customize at will) let format = &filetype =~ '.*tex' ? 'citep' : 'pandoc' let api_call = 'http://127.
